name: MCP Server Reliability Constraint
description: Ensures MCP server startup reliability with minimum validation failure thresholds

validationCriteria.description: Component loading success rate must meet minimum threshold
validationCriteria.check: Measure percentage of components that load successfully

validationCriteria.description: All Force modules must initialize without errors
validationCriteria.check: Verify patterns, constraints, and governance modules initialize properly
validationCriteria.errorMessage: Module initialization failed - missing __init__.py or initialize() function

validationCriteria.description: Extended schema should be preferred when available
validationCriteria.check: Verify ForceValidator uses extended schema if present
validationCriteria.errorMessage: Validator not using extended schema despite availability

validationCriteria.description: Learning data should load without format errors
validationCriteria.check: Verify learning data parsing handles both list and dict formats
validationCriteria.errorMessage: Learning data format not handled correctly
